transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Your call has been forwarded to voicemail. The person you're trying to reach is not available. At the tone, please record your message. When you have finished recording, you may hang up.
Speaker A: Hey, Robert, this is Aishtika from Amber, and this call is regarding your accommodation. You are searching in London, so let me know your convenient time to connect with you, or else you can reach out to me on WhatsApp. Thank you. Have a good day.

Speaker A: Please leave your message for 817-800-4307. Hi, this is Khushi. I'm calling from the Amber Student Support Team. This is a quick call regarding your confirmation. We do see that you had booked an accommodation with us at Spring News in London. So kindly confirm your name, email address or any sort of unique ID that was used at the time of your booking and your room number if you have moved in at the accommodation. It would really help us, you know, updating it on our systems. Thank you and we hope you have a great day ahead. Bye. Bye.
